text: Nicolás Patricio Ortíz Vergara (born 6 April 1984) is a Chilean footballer. His last club was Barnechea. ==Honours== ===Player=== ;Deportes Iquique * Copa Chile (1): 2013–14 ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Coquimbo Unido footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Primera B de Chile players Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Nicolás Ortiz (footballer, born 1984)
